title: The Virtual Draft, Tua Rumors, McCaffrey’s New Deal, and the Demise of the XFL | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Yahoo senior NFL reporter Charles Robinson joins the show to preview the first virtual NFL draft and discuss how teams are scouting prospects, the possibility of having no NFL offseason, Christian McCaffrey’s new four-year extension that averages $16 million per year, and how the lack of clarity on Tua Tagovailoa’s health maybe affect his draft position (2:00). Then, The Ringer’s Rodger Sherman calls in to talk about the XFL filing for bankruptcy (40:55).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Charles Robinson and Rodger Sherman
